description: President Rouhani says fighting between its neighbours Azerbaijan and Armenia could escalate.
title: Nagorno-Karabakh: Iran warns of 'regional war' as fighting rages
title_page: Nagorno-Karabakh: Iran warns of 'regional war' as fighting rages - BBC News
maintext: We found a handful of families sheltering below ground. One elderly woman - whose son and daughter are fighting with Azerbaijani forces on the frontline - told us she was waiting for victory and would never leave.
